item.description:

Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a software

Feb 1, 15:19 UTC
Update - The actual emails that are sent have no latency.
Those sent earlier are gradually being delivered.
It may take longer for them to be delivered.

Feb 1, 13:36 UTC
Identified - Start time : 01/02/2024 13:00 UTC
Service impact : Email delivery slowdown, no loss of emails sent before.
Root cause : Incident caused by high traffic.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix.
